title: ES6 Features Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of modern JavaScript ES6 features

questions.question: Which symbol defines a template literal?
questions.explanation: Template literals use backticks for string interpolation.

questions.question: What is the main advantage of arrow functions?
What does destructuring do?
choices: Unpacks values from arrays/objects into variables
questions.explanation: Unpacks values from arrays/objects into variables.

questions.question:
Which line correctly destructures an object?
const user = { name: "Luna", age: 19 };
